message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SD 

This paper deals with sentiment analysis and natural language processing, which are both sub-fields of computer science. The paper specifically focuses on analyzing linguistic patterns in phrases with opposing polarities and applying sentiment composition techniques to them. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, since the paper uses unsupervised and supervised techniques, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing) could also be possible sub-categories.
